channel.title: Html help
channel.description:
ok ive been learning html codeing cause of 2 things. i like createing stuff. 2 my noobish school is doing a ict test on html so i mite aswell do somethink that i like and will help me in school im learning good but need to know some things please
[b]adding a register system when people have to create a account
how to add like more then just noobish backgrounds like blue.. red.. ect i wanna add metal style
how to make a forums
please could u add my msn [/b]code@java.com
:Dty

item.title: Html help
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

[quote=“graphics ownz, post:1, topic:99245”]ok ive been learning html codeing cause of 2 things. i like createing stuff. 2 my noobish school is doing a ict test on html so i mite aswell do somethink that i like and will help me in school im learning good but need to know some things please

[b]adding a register system when people have to create a account

how to add like more then just noobish backgrounds like blue… red… ect i wanna add metal style

how to make a forums

please could u add my msn [/b]code@java.com

:Dty[/quote]

ok ill answer all of these for you.

  1. you need a server side script (php) with a msql db system.

  2. you could use an image just find one you like.

3.download a forum package and install it, google smf.

4.no don’t do msn

Read full topic
